title: Bug 2940: Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: When exporting a zip file, the updating of checkboxes should display a busy cursor.
OB: When exporting a zip file, the checkboxes do not display a busy cursor when they are being updated.
EB: When exporting a zip file, the checkboxes should display a busy cursor while they are being updated.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open a workspace with many projects.
2. Export the workspace as a zip file.
3. Select all projects.
4. Select file types and choose some.
5. Press OK.
